data.eml:eml: Eleven new species of the genus Belisana Thorell (Araneae: Pholcidae) from South China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Feng, Peng, Yan-Qiu (2011): Eleven new species of the genus Belisana Thorell (Araneae: Pholcidae) from South China. Zootaxa 2989: 51-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201302
